helper: Applying a Preset will replace the current Colour, Accent, Font, Style, Radius, Shadow, Shade and Background.
Saving a Theme will record the current Colour, Accent, Font, Style, Opacity, Radius, Shadow, Shade and Background.

automatic.label: Automatic
automatic.description: Follow the system Light or Dark mode.

helper: Backgrounds, Bookmarks and Modals use shades from the left.
Text and form elements use shades from the right.
For a light look switch to the Light Style and then select a Primary colour. And vice versa for a dark look.

contrast.label: Contrast range
helper: Move the Contrast range controls close together for a muted look.
Move the Contrast range controls far apart from each other for a sharp vivid look.

cycle.alert: Take care as a fast changing Accent hue may cause performance issues.
helper: Auto change Accent hue will not work when the Accent colour is a grey or black.

helper.p1: Use a Google Font to customise the Clock, Date, Group names and Bookmark Letters.
helper.p2: Add a font name as it appears on Google Fonts, including capital letters and spaces, eg: enter "Fredoka One" or "Kanit".
helper.p3: Clear the field to use the default font "Fjalla One".

weight.label: Font weight
helper: Not all fonts support all weights. Refer to the Google Font page to see which are available.

helper.p1: Use a Google Font to customise the Bookmark name, URL and form elements.
helper.p2: Add a font name as it appears on Google Fonts, including capital letters and spaces, eg: enter "Roboto", "Source Sans Pro" or "Noto Sans".
helper.p3: Clear the field to use the default font "Open Sans".

weight.label: Font weight
helper: Not all fonts support all weights. Refer to the Google Font page to see which are available.

blur.label: Shade blur
helper: Not supported by all browsers.

general.label: All opacity
helper: Change the opacity of Search bar, Bookmarks, Group controls and the Toolbar.
Opacity can also be changed when editing individual Bookmarks.

theme.label: Background by Theme
description: Use the Background colour defined by the Theme.

accent.label: Background by Accent
description: Use the Accent colour for the Background.

alert.p1: Local images can no longer be used. Images must be hosted somewhere online.

url.label: URL
helper: Add more than one URL separated by spaces or on new lines for a random background image on load.
Unsplash can be used for random images, eg:
https://source.unsplash.com/random/1920x1080/?night,day,sky
Change parameters after .../random/ for more options. Loading times may vary.

alert.p1: YouTube page URLs can not be used.
alert.p2: How to link to a video file.

url.label: URL
helper: Background video only supports a direct URL to a video file. Supports MP4 and WebM format.
Add more than one URL separated by spaces or on new lines for a random background video on load.

transparent.label: Transparent
transparent.description: No background colour behind the Layout.

custom.label: Custom colour
custom.description: Use a custom colour behind the Layout.

blur.label: Background blur
helper: Not supported by all browsers.

layout.divider: Divider between Header and Bookmark area

transparent.label: Transparent
transparent.description: No background colour behind the Header area.

custom.label: Custom colour
custom.description: Use a custom colour behind the Header area.

transparent.label: Transparent
transparent.description: No background colour behind the Bookmark area.

custom.label: Custom colour
custom.description: Use a custom colour behind the Bookmark area.

border.label: Bookmark border
helper: Bookmark border can also be changed when editing individual Bookmarks.
The colour of the Border is defined by the Accent which can also be changed when editing individual Bookmarks.

rainbow.add: Add unique accent to each Bookmark
helper: Bookmark custom Accent can also be changed when editing individual Bookmarks.

justify.label: Header area alignment
helper1: Effects may not be visible if the Header Area is full width.
helper2: Only available when Layout Direction is Vertical and Header items are shown.

justify.label: Bookmark area alignment
helper1: Effects may not be visible if the Bookmark Area is full width.
helper2: Only available when Layout Direction is Vertical and Header items are shown.

layout.padding: Space around Header and Bookmark Area
layout.gutter: Space between Header and Bookmark items

horizontal.label: Align horizontal
horizontal.description: Stack the Header and Bookmarks in a row side by side.

vertical.label: Align vertical
vertical.description: Stack the Header and Bookmarks in a column one above the other.

headerBookmark.label: Header then Bookmarks
headerBookmark.description: Order the Header area to appear before the Bookmarks area.

bookmarkHeader.label: Bookmarks then Header
bookmarkHeader.description: Order the Bookmarks area to appear before the Header area.

favicon.label: Favicon URL
helper: Not supported by all browsers.

scrollbar.label: Scrollbar
helper: Not supported by all browsers.

unblur.label: Unblur background image or video
description: Background image or video will unblur when scrolled to the bottom of the page.
Image or video blur can be found under Theme Background.

helper: Effects may not be visible if  Search box size is set to Auto and grows to fill available space.

newLine.label: New line
newLine.description: Force on to a new line and seperate from other Header items.

none.label: None
none.description: Useful for displaying just the name.

custom.label: Custom
description: Defaults to "Good morning..." if left blank.

show.label: Show Transitional words
helper: Only available when Date or Time is shown.

newLine.label: New line
newLine.description: Force on to a new line and seperate from other Header items.

newLine.label: New line
newLine.description: Force on to a new line and seperate from other Header items.

newLine.label: New line
newLine.description: Force on to a new line and seperate from other Header items.

auto.label: Auto width
auto.description: Search box will grow to best fit available space.

custom.label: Custom width
custom.description: Define how wide the Search box should be inside the Header Area.

newLine.label: New line
newLine.description: Force on to a new line and seperate from other Header items.

url.label: URL
helper: Enter a web address with the search parameters, eg: "https://vimeo.com/search?q="
{appName} will add the search term entered into the Search box at the end of the above URL.

queryName.label: Name attribute
helper: Sets the name attribute on the Search input field.
This defines the name passed to the search engine when submitting. If not sure leave blank.

search.newTab: Open Search results in a new tab

shadowShow.label: Show shadow on Bookmark hover
shadowShow.description: Effects may not be visible if Theme Shadow is set to 0.

general.newTab: Open Bookmarks in a new tab

helper: Display the URL and Controls either at the top or bottom of a Bookmark Tile.

headerBody.label: Group details then Bookmarks
headerBody.description: Order the Group details area to appear before the Bookmarks area.

bodyHeader.label: Bookmarks then Group details
bodyHeader.description: Order the Bookmarks area to appear before the Group details area.

helper: Group Names can also be changed by editing individual Groups.

collapse.label: Group Collapse control
helper: Group toolbar collapse button can also be changed by editing individual Groups.

openAll.label: Group Open all control
helper: Group toolbar open all button can also be changed by editing individual Groups.
Position the Toolbar inside the Header or in a corner of the window.

newLine.label: New line
newLine.description: Force on to a new line and seperate from other Header items.
helper: Only available when the Toolbar is positioned inside the Header.

position.label: Toolbar position
helper1: Position the Toolbar in one of the four corners of the window.
helper2: Only available when the Toolbar is positioned in a corner.

helper: Restore a previously exported {appName} backup.
restore.drop: Or drop a {appName} backup file here.

helper: Download a backup of your {appName} Bookmarks and Settings.
This file can later be imported on this or another deivce.

alert.p1: You will lose Bookmarks by clearing all data.

helper: Clear all data to reset {appName} to the default state.
Alternatively, it is possible to wipe all settings but keep the current Bookmarks and Groups.

page.backgroundImageVideo: Setting a background video or image

coffee.p1: {appName} is free, appreciation is welcome in the form of coffee!

app.para1: Share your setup with the community.

remove.content: Are you sure you want to remove this Bookmark? This can not be undone.

visual.heading: Visual & Name
visual.description: Display Letters, Icon, Image and a Name on this Bookmark tile.

address.heading: Address
address.description: Be sure to use the full URL and include "https://..."

position.heading: Position
position.description: The Group to place this Bookmark in.

layout.heading: Layout
layout.description: Change the Visual Element and Name position, scale and orientation.

theme.heading: Theme
theme.description: Override the Theme and Accent colour.

vertical.label: Vertical
vertical.description: Stack the Visual Element and Name one above the other.

horizontal.label: Horizontal
horizontal.description: Arrange the Visual Element and Name side by side.

visualName.label: Visual element then name
visualName.description: Place the Visual Element before the Name.

nameVisual.label: Name then visual element
nameVisual.description: Place the Name before the Visual Element.

show.label: Show Visual Element
show.description: Display Letters, Icon or an Image on this Bookmark hexagon.

helper: Visual shadow only applies to a Letter or Icon.

theme.label: Theme Accent
theme.description: Use the Accent defined by the Theme.

theme.label: Theme colour
theme.description: Use the Colour defined by the Theme.

show.label: Show background
show.description: Display an Image or video Background on this Bookmark tile.

image.label: Background image URL
helper: Background image only supports a direct URL to an image file.

video.label: Background video URL
helper: Background video only supports a direct URL to a video file. Supports MP4 and WebM format.
YouTube page URLs can not be used.

wide.label: Wide tile
wide.description: Bookmark tile to span across two columns.

tall.label: Tall tile
tall.description: Bookmark tile to span across two rows.

visual.label: Apply "Show Visual Element" and "Show Name" to other Bookmarks
description: The Letter, Icon, Image and Name text will not be shared.
Useful for hiding the Visual Elements or Names on all Bookmarks.

layout.label: Apply Layout to other Bookmarks
description: When saved, apply the above Layout to all other Bookmarks.
Only the Visual and Name size, Alignment, Order, Position and Gutter will be will be applied to all.

theme.label: Apply Theme to other Bookmarks
description: When saved, apply the above Theme to all other Bookmarks.
Only the Colour, Accent, Opacity, Border and Visual shadow will be applied to all.
